Matches SQL GroupBy feature. Receives a flow and aggregates it based on one or more columns. The aggregation key and the relevant result of operations (such as min, max, sum etc) are provided for each output line. ('Opt' for 'Optimized', this component will replace eventually the current tAggregateRow component)
